JGAL

Class GAL_DoubleGeneConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_GeneConfig<T>
      • JGAL.GAL_NumericalGeneConfig<java.lang.Double>
        • JGAL.GAL_DoubleGeneConfig

  • public class GAL_DoubleGeneConfig
extends GAL_NumericalGeneConfig<java.lang.Double>
    The GAL_DoubleGeneConfig is an extension from the GAL_NumericalGeneConfig that allows the creation of Double genes.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class JGAL.GAL_NumericalGeneConfig

        max, min

      • Fields inherited from class JGAL.GAL_GeneConfig

        rand

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GAL_DoubleGeneConfig()
      Initializes a GAL_IntegerGeneConfig with min field equal 0 and max field equal Double.MAX_VALUE
      GAL_DoubleGeneConfig(java.lang.Double min, java.lang.Double max)
      Constructs a new GAL_DoubleGeneConfig object with minimum and maximum possible value for the trait of a GAL_Gene.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeValueTo(GAL_Gene gene)
      Change the trait of an double GAL_Gene object, to another one in the range [min,max).
      void setRandomValueTo(GAL_Gene gene)
      Assigns a random value to the trait of a binary GAL_Gene object with an equal probability to get any number in the range [min,max] as the trait value.

      • Methods inherited from class JGAL.GAL_NumericalGeneConfig

        getMax, getMin, setValueTo

      • Methods inherited from class JGAL.GAL_GeneConfig

        createNewGene, setValueToFrom

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GAL_DoubleGeneConfig

        public GAL_DoubleGeneConfig()
                     throws NotValidGeneException
        Initializes a GAL_IntegerGeneConfig with min field equal 0 and max field equal Double.MAX_VALUE
        Throws:
        NotValidGeneException

      • GAL_DoubleGeneConfig

        public GAL_DoubleGeneConfig(java.lang.Double min,
                    java.lang.Double max)
                     throws NotValidGeneException
        Constructs a new GAL_DoubleGeneConfig object with minimum and maximum possible value for the trait of a GAL_Gene.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum value the trait can get. If it's null it will set min as 0.
        max - The maximum value the trait can get. If it's null it will set max as Double.MAX_VALUE.
        Throws:
        NotValidGeneException - If min > max.

    • Method Detail

      • setRandomValueTo

        public void setRandomValueTo(GAL_Gene gene)
        Assigns a random value to the trait of a binary GAL_Gene object with an equal probability to get any number in the range [min,max] as the trait value.
        Specified by:
        setRandomValueTo in class GAL_GeneConfig<java.lang.Double>
        Parameters:
        gene - The Gal_Gene wich trait is going to be modified.

      • changeValueTo

        public void changeValueTo(GAL_Gene gene)
        Change the trait of an double GAL_Gene object, to another one in the range [min,max).
        Specified by:
        changeValueTo in class GAL_GeneConfig<java.lang.Double>
        Parameters:
        gene - The Gal_Gene wich trait is going to be modified.
